About the Company: The Lakshmi Mills Group has been a company in the Indian textile industry. The flagship company, The Lakshmi Mills Company Ltd., has been established around 90 years ago. The name of Lakshmi Mills has become synonymous with quality cotton and synthetic textiles. The group started a number of other enterprises with the aim of making the group a complete player in the field of textiles. Today, the group is a complete textile house with units engaged in manufacturing various textile machineries with distinction..The company also in the business activities of Other Engineering Services.
